examples.text: Time to sleep , mornight everyone? ara sign out? https : /

relations.target: night: the time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside <i116919>
morning: the time period between dawn and noon; 'I spent the morning running errands' <i116908>
time period: an amount of time; 'a time period of 30 years'; 'hastened the period of time of his recovery'; 'Picasso's blue period' <i116632>

senses.definition: both morning and night, used when greeting someone
